post.summary: [EARLY ACCESS] Evaluate: Run one or more evaluations
post.description: Given a dictionary of evaluation requests (keyed by any arbitrary correlation identifier), each will be evaluated according to the current user's policies (deduced from the provided OAuth token).

parameters.description: Optional. The application type of the roles and policies to use when evaluating.

parameters.name: asAt
parameters.description: Optional. The requested AsAt date of the entitlements

schema.description: Optional. The requested AsAt date of the entitlements

fromEffectiveDate.description: The start date for the requested effective date range for the resource (if null, UtcNow)

toEffectiveDate.description: The end date for the requested effective date range for the resource (if null, same as from date)

fromAsAt.description: The requested AsAt date for the resource (if null, Latest). If specifying a range of AsAt dates, this is the lower bounds.

toAsAt.description: Upper bound if specifying a request that requires a range of AsAt dates. This is used if specifying the desire to grant access for a user between an AsAt range.
